jobDescription: Our work is challenging, our opportunity is huge, and we are looking for people who enjoy working hard with enthusiastic teammates.  The ideal candidate must have a demonstrated aptitude and enthusiasm for healthcare data and its application in improving patient lives. Must have a strong orientation toward teamwork. Candidate must have a good understanding of research being done using healthcare data; must be able to develop the requisite expertise to guide data users/researchers in navigating complex data structures towards reaching their analysis/research goals. Must be able to outline possible solutions and strategies to solve research problems when needed. Job Responsibilities: Provide customer support with data training for clinical and claims data.  Create and maintain all relevant training materials including pertinent documentation for all data assets  Contribute to training design and development  Work closely with our account management and clinical teams towards addressing client needs  Conduct data exploration, solve data problems using SQL  Travel requirement: 50 - 60%
